definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: He is the high priest of amateur basketball in this country.
sentences.chinese: 他是本国业余篮球头面人物。

sentences.english: All the big names in the pop music world are at the party.
sentences.chinese: 流行音乐界的头面人物都参加了聚会。

sentences.english: And leading political figures are, at long last, showing some outrage.
sentences.chinese: 终于，头面政治人物表现出了一些愤怒之情。

sentences.english: Everybody who was anybody in Labor politics turned up.
sentences.chinese: 工党政治生活中的头面人物个个都到场了。

sentences.english: She is a leading light in the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 她是这个剧院里的头面人物。

sentences.english: most of them are corporate bigwigs and financial wheeler-dealers.
sentences.chinese: 大多数为公司的头面人物和金融界追逐高利润的人。

sentences.english: My grandfather was a big shot.
His outgoing personality made him the ideal front-man for the band.
sentences.chinese: 他那外向的性格使他很适合做乐队的头面人物。

definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
embroidered headband used as decoration by actors or in Hui ethnic group/to reward an actor with brocade headband
